# cml2 Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "cml2" {
  address     = var.cml_hostname
  token       = var.cml_token
  skip_verify = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `address` (String) CML controller address
- `token` (String, Sensitive) CML API token (JWT)

### Optional

- `skip_verify` (Boolean) disable TLS certificate verification
